title: First load of the day incredibly slow
body: Whenever I load up the first game of the day it takes almost 10 minutes to begin loading. Once it starts to load it loads in 1-5 seconds. My teammates are all at 100% for a long time before I actually load into the game. I have normal ping during the game (55-60). All following games connect quickly and I load at a normal pace. (Approx 15-30 seconds). My PC exceeds all requirements by quite a significant margin and only encounter this issue once per day

replies.body: It might be that the game is just taking a bit loading those files the first time. I would try checking the option "close client during game" in the client settings and see if that helps out with the first loads, or you could try a quick repair as well.
